t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: This Amazon product is counterfeit. It broke out my face terribly. After the bad experience, I purchased the product from Mitchell Brands website so I could compare with the Amazon product. They were a complete mismatch: different color, different texture, different scent.

t: Carotis – Mitchell Brands
s: Our Carotis® skin toning products contain naturally extracted Carrot Oil. They quickly produce a beautiful golden tone. When used in combination with our SkinProtect® sunblock line; they shield the skin better against the damaging effects of UVR than chemical sunscreens alone.
